title: Longest Common Subsequence
description: In computer science, the longest common subsequence (LCS) problem is to find the longest subsequence common to all sequences in a set of sequences (often just two sequences). It differs from problems of finding common substrings: unlike substrings, subsequences are not required to occupy consecutive positions within the original sequences.

meta.title: Longest Common Subsequence
meta.description: Explore the fascinating world of the Longest Common Subsequence (LCS) problem in computer science, from its introduction to practical implementation.
meta.keywords: algorithms, python playground, problem solving, algorithm playground, python, algorithm, longest common subsequence, programming, computer science

i18n.title: 最长公共子序列
i18n.description: 在计算机科学中，最长公共子序列（LCS）问题是在一组序列（通常只有两个序列）中找到所有序列共有的最长子序列。它与寻找公共子串的问题不同：与子串不同，子序列不要求在原始序列中占据连续的位置。

meta.title: 最长公共子序列
meta.description: 探索计算机科学中最长公共子序列（LCS）问题的迷人世界，从其介绍到实际实现。
